text: O tagii on e fittaandu wooturu, refi O waɗi e ndun, genndo mayru. O jippinani on e neemoraaɗi ɗin, nooneeji jeetati. Himo taga on ka teege yumma mon en, tagu ɓaawo tagu, e nder niɓe tati. Ko On mooɗon Allah, woni Joomi mon ! Ko Kanko laamu woodani. Reweteeɗo alaa, si wanaa Allah. Ko honno ferlitoraɗon [e rewugol Mo]
